Package org.birchframework.framework.marshall

Class MarshallUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.birchframework.framework.marshall.MarshallUtils
  • @Component
public class MarshallUtils
extends Object
    (Un)Marshalling utility methods. Must import JacksonAutoConfiguration in order to use.
    Author:
    Keivan Khalichi
    See Also:
    JacksonAutoConfiguration

      • fromXML

        public <T> Optional<T> fromXML​(InputStream theData,
                               Class<T> theClass,
                               boolean theIsNamespaceAware,
                               boolean theIsValidating)
                        throws MarshallingError
        Unmarshall XML data given class and data; name-space awareness and validating parser are configurable.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the class
        Parameters:
        theData - the XML data to be unmarshalled
        theClass - the target class
        theIsNamespaceAware - enable/disable name-space awareness
        theIsValidating - enable/disable validating parser
        Returns:
        instance of the unmarshalled object
        Throws:
        MarshallingError - if there are any exceptions

      • fromXMLDocument

        public <T> Optional<T> fromXMLDocument​(Document theDocument,
                                       Class<T> theClass)
                                throws MarshallingError
        Unmarshall an XML document given class and data; name-space awareness and validating parser are configurable. This is a DOM implementation that uses DocumentBuilder.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the class
        Parameters:
        theDocument - the XML data to be unmarshalled
        theClass - the target class
        Returns:
        instance of the unmarshalled object
        Throws:
        MarshallingError - if there are any exceptions

      • parse

        public Document parse​(InputStream theData,
                      boolean theIsNamespaceAware,
                      boolean theIsValidating)
               throws MarshallingError
        Parses an XML document given class and data; name-space awareness and validating parser are configurable. This is a DOM implementation that uses DocumentBuilder.
        Parameters:
        theData - the XML data to be unmarshalled
        theIsNamespaceAware - enable/disable name-space awareness
        theIsValidating - enable/disable validating parser
        Returns:
        instance of a DOM document object
        Throws:
        MarshallingError - if there are any exceptions
